course.title: Osteoarchaeology Lab
course.meeting_text: W., 2:30-5:30, and at least three hours of laboratory weekly.
course.description: Introduction to the osteoarchaeological analysis. Identification of animal bones and teeth from archaeological sites using comparative materials and their characterization employing visual, metric, and microscopic methods.
course.notes: Given in alternate years. Open to qualified undergraduates. Fulfills laboratory course requirement for archaeology graduate students and archaeological science requirement for undergraduate concentrators.
